mapper.select: SELECT A.EMP_NO, A.EMP_ID, A.EMP_NAME, A.EMP_EMAIL, A.OFFICE_TEL, A.EMP_PHONE, A.STATUS, A.POS_NO, B.POS_NAME, A.DEP_NO, C.DEP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE A LEFT JOIN JOB_POSITION B ON (A.POS_NO = B.POS_NO) LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT C ON(A.DEP_NO = C.DEP_NO) ORDER BY EMP_NO DESC
